titleInfo.title: Photograph of Mt. Olive Baptist Sunday School Meeting, 1935

location.physicalLocation: Special Collections Division of the Nashville Public Library, 615 Church Street, Nashville, Tennessee, 37219

mods.abstract: A black and white photograph of Baptists gathered outside the Patton family home across from Hadley Park in Nashville, Tennessee in 1935. They are arranged in a tight circle, seated in folding chairs. The event was a joint meeting of the Galeda and Metoka classes of the Mt. Olive Baptist Sunday School that was held at the residence of Alice Otey Patton, whose husband was Reverend John Thomas Patton. Dr. John L. Hill, book editor for the Sunday school board of the Southern Baptist convention, was the guest speaker. The gathering brought together both black and white members of the Baptist community.
